text: Actions are judged by intentions, so each man will have what he intended.
arabic_text: إِنَّمَا الْأَعْمَالُ بِالنِّيَّاتِ

text: The strong believer is better and more beloved to Allah than the weak believer, while there is good in both.
arabic_text: الْمُؤْمِنُ الْقَوِيُّ خَيْرٌ وَأَحَبُّ إِلَى اللَّهِ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِ الضَّعِيفِ

text: None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself.
arabic_text: لَا يُؤْمِنُ أَحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى يُحِبَّ لأَخِيهِ مَا يُحِبُّ لِنَفْسِهِ

text: Whoever removes a worldly grief from a believer, Allah will remove from him one of the griefs of the Day of Resurrection.
arabic_text: مَنْ فَرَّجَ عَنْ مُؤْمِنٍ كُرْبَةً مِنْ كُرَبِ الدُّنْيَا

text: The best among you are those who have the best manners and character.
arabic_text: خَيْرُكُمْ خَيْرُكُمْ لِأَهْلِهِ

text: The best of people are those that bring most benefit to the rest of mankind.
arabic_text: خَيْرُ النَّاسِ أَنْفَعُهُمْ لِلنَّاسِ

text: Paradise lies at the feet of your mother.
arabic_text: الجنة تحت أقدام الأمهات

text: The best jihad is (to speak) a word of truth before a tyrannical ruler.
arabic_text: خَيْرُ الْجِهَادِ كَلِمَةُ حَقٍّ لَدَىٰ سُلْطَانٍ جَائِرٍ

text: Whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day, let him speak good or remain silent.
arabic_text: مَنْ كَانَ يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ فَلْيَقُلْ خَيْرًا أَوْ لِيَصْمُتْ

text: Allah does not look at your appearance or wealth but looks at your hearts and deeds.
arabic_text: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يَنْظُرُ إِلَى أَجْسَادِكُمْ وَلَا إِلَى صُوَرِكُمْ وَلَكِنْ يَنْظُرُ إِلَى قُلُوبِكُمْ وَأَعْمَالِكُمْ

text: Make things easy for people and do not make things difficult for them.
arabic_text: يَسِّرُوا وَلَا تُعَسِّرُوا

text: The best people are those who are most beneficial to people.
arabic_text: خَيْرُ النَّاسِ أَنْفَعُهُمْ لِلنَّاسِ

text: None of you truly believes until he wishes for his brother what he wishes for himself.
arabic_text: لَا يُؤْمِنُ أَحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى يُحِبَّ لِأَخِيهِ مَا يُحِبُّ لِنَفْسِهِ

text: The best of charity is that given when one is rich.
arabic_text: خَيْرُ الصَّدَقَةِ مَا كَانَ مِنْ غِنًى

text: He who does not thank people, does not thank Allah.
arabic_text: مَن لَمْ يَشْكُرِ النَّاسَ لَمْ يَشْكُرِ اللَّهَ

text: The best of you are those who learn the Quran and teach it.
arabic_text: خَيْرُكُمْ مَنْ تَعَلَّمَ الْقُرْآنَ وَعَلَّمَهُ

text: The best of you is the best in character.
arabic_text: خَيْرُكُمْ خَيْرُكُمْ لِأَهْلِهِ

text: The best among you are those who have the best manners and character.
arabic_text: خَيْرُكُمْ خَيْرُكُمْ لِأَهْلِهِ

text: Whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day should not harm his neighbour.
arabic_text: مَن كَانَ يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ فَلَا يُؤْذِي جَارَهُ

text: The most beloved deeds to Allah are those done regularly, even if they are few.
arabic_text: أَحَبُّ الْأَعْمَالِ إِلَى اللَّهِ أَدْوَمُهَا وَإِنْ قَلَّ

text: A Muslim is the one from whose tongue and hands the people are safe.
arabic_text: الْمُسْلِمُ مَنْ سَلِمَ الْمُسْلِمُونَ مِنْ لِسَانِهِ وَيَدِهِ
